content.html: “CAPTCHAs don’t prove you’re human – they prove you’re American” shkspr.mobi/blog/2017/11/c… I wrote this rant 3 years ago, and things are getting worse. Yesterday I had to identify crosswalks, highway signs, and overhead traffic lights. Do self driving cars only work in the USA?
content.value:
“CAPTCHAs don’t prove you’re human – they prove you’re American”

I wrote this rant 3 years ago, and things are getting worse. Yesterday I had to identify crosswalks, highway signs, and overhead traffic lights.

Do self driving cars only work in the USA?
